mapper.insert: insert into article(writerId, topic, title, content) values(#{writerId}, #{topic}, #{title}, #{content});
insert into articleComments(articleNo, writerId, comments) values(#{articleNo}, #{writerId}, #{comments});
mapper.select: select * from article order by wroteAt desc
select * from article order by wroteAt desc limit 10 offset #{offset}
select * from article where title like #{keyword} or content like #{keyword} order by wroteAt desc limit 10 offset #{offset};
select * from article where title like #{keyword} or content like #{keyword} order by wroteAt desc
select writerId, count(*) as cnt from article group by writerId order by cnt desc limit 5;
select * from articleComments where articleNo=#{articleNo} order by writingTime desc;
mapper.update: update article set commentCnt=commentCnt+1 where no=${no};
update article set viewCnt=viewCnt+1 where no=${no};
update article set likeCnt=likeCnt+1 where no=${no};
update article set likeCnt=likeCnt-1 where no=${no};
update article set topic=#{topic}, title=#{title}, content=#{content} where no=#{no}
